charges.charge_description: 21:846 and 18:2 CONSPIRACY AND POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE 500 GRAMS OR MORE METHAMPHETAMINE MIXTURE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant pleaded guilty to counts I and III of the indictment and was committed to the custody of Bureau of Prisons for 240 months on counts I and III. The defendant's previously imposed sentence is reduced to 210 months on counts I and III, to run concurrently; 5 years of supervised release on count I and 3 years of supervised release on count III to run concurrently; $200.00 Special Assessment.
